channel.title: Homes on Saichethan M. Reddy
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Saichethan M. Reddy

item.description: About me I am a junior year undergraduate student at Indian Institute of Information Technology, Bhagalpur in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering with Computer Science as my major. My research interests lie in developing and learning novel deep learning approaches to solve problems (particularly which are relatable to real world). Currently I am Technical Club Secretary of our college, I am also leading Mozilla campus club for more than a year.

item.title: Work
item.description: Internships Summer Internship 2019 IIT Patna: (AI-ML-NLP Lab) Worked on developing Multi Modal Named Entity Recognization (NER), which uses both Visual features and texual (word level & character level) embeddings for better NER accuracy.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: 2018-2019 academic year: WEB 101: Introduction to Web development (Spring) Syllabus, for more content and slides check out Classroom

item.title: Honors & Awards
item.description: Paper has accepted for ICCSE 2019 (but not attended) PyTorch Scholar 2019 Technical Club Secretary (2018-19) Google India Challenge Scholarship 2018 Mozilla Campus Club Lead (2017-18)

item.title: Extra Curicular
item.description: I love watching animes, Naruto ShippÅ«den and One Piece are my favourites. The Dark Knight(Batman) is one of the finest movies I have ever seen. I play volleyball and table tennis. I follow CNBC regularly for technical updates. I am bit of dreamer and introvert, I prefer to have limited friends. I started a breast cancer awareness campaign PinkRoses, is a place where people can learn about breast cancer, prevention and diagnosis.
